Enchantment 6

Hidden in Snow
Ritual
W3D1
spell id [id]: 932
effect number [effect_number]: 100
damage [damage]: 1
number of effects [nreff]: 1
gems required [gemcost]: 75W
Terrain-Specific Ritual Summon:#1201 Unfrozen Lord,
#1200 Unfrozen Mage,
#1202 Unfrozen Warrior,
#1203 Unfrozen
Source Terrain : Mountains, Border Mountains
This spell can only be cast in a cold mountain province. The caster locates and releases a tribe of ancient undead warriors from their glacial prison. A full tribe of Unfrozen is freed. The Unfrozen are led by a chieftain and a mage. If cast in a province of turmoil a warlike tribe with greater amounts of warriors will answer the call. If cast in a province of fortune or magic, a tribe with more mages is likely to answer the call.
